data.text: @SenatorTimScott @POTUS @BankingGOP Is this the same POTUS that posts racist videos? Maybe rethink who you support.
@SenatorTimScott @POTUS @BankingGOP Secure our elections first! No amnesty.  Proof of citizenship to vote.  Then talk about peripheral things like this
@SenatorTimScott @POTUS @BankingGOP Hey Tim :  You might want to handle this first ;  https://t.co/8c16c8KYHM
@SenatorTimScott @POTUS @BankingGOP Hilarious.  Does your soul die a little bit every time you lie for him? And do you have any self-respect left?

@MitziSharb4568 @SenatorTimScott @POTUS @BankingGOP Can you imagine how deep in the cult you have to be to think that “prices are falling”? You delusional 🦇💩 moron.  
Just keep waiting for that mothership 🙄
@SenatorTimScott @POTUS @BankingGOP You’re an Uncle Tom. You can’t unpost racism. The fact that you support a racist President is disgraceful and disgusting.
